trans-unit.target: .NET Platform 用パブリッシャー

trans-unit.source: The target framework to publish for. The target framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 発行用のターゲット フレームワーク。ターゲット フレームワークはプロジェクト ファイルで指定する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: The output directory to place the published artifacts in.
trans-unit.target: 発行された成果物を配置する出力ディレクトリ。

trans-unit.source: The path to a target manifest file that contains the list of packages to be excluded from the publish step.
trans-unit.target: 発行ステップから除外されるパッケージのリストを含むターゲット マニフェスト ファイルへのパス。

trans-unit.source: Do not build the project before publishing. Implies --no-restore.
trans-unit.target: 発行する前にプロジェクトをビルドしないでください。--no-restore を意味します。

trans-unit.source: The target runtime to publish the application for. The default is to publish a framework-dependent application without an executable.
trans-unit.target: The target runtime to publish the application for. The default is to publish a framework-dependent application without an executable.

trans-unit.source: The configuration to publish for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.
trans-unit.target: The configuration to publish for. The default for most projects is 'Debug'.

trans-unit.source: The mode to use when publishing the application. The 'self-contained' mode publishes the application with the .NET Core runtime. The 'fx-dependent' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent with an executable if a target runtime is specified. The 'fx-dependent-no-exe' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent without an executable. The default is 'fx-dependent-no-exe' when a target runtime is not specified. The default is 'self-contained' when a target runtime is specified.
trans-unit.target: The mode to use when publishing the application. The 'self-contained' mode publishes the application with the .NET Core runtime. The 'fx-dependent' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent with an executable if a target runtime is specified. The 'fx-dependent-no-exe' mode publishes the application as framework-dependent without an executable. The default is 'fx-dependent-no-exe' when a target runtime is not specified. The default is 'self-contained' when a target runtime is specified.

trans-unit.source: The '--mode' and '--self-contained' options conflict. Specify only one of the options.
trans-unit.target: The '--mode' and '--self-contained' options conflict. Specify only one of the options.

trans-unit.source: The specified publish mode '{0}' is not supported.
trans-unit.target: The specified publish mode '{0}' is not supported.
